amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to implement any furlough of civilian employees while funds remain in the defense working capital fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to carry out furloughs of Working Capital Fund civilian employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Cole.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
